projects.title: Dream hinter
projects.description: The Cyber Vertex project integrates cybersecurity and digital forensics news data and learning resources. Provide a one-stop network security-related content provision platform. It also provides some social functions, to help learners to communicate and learn in a technical community. It may promote the development of cybersecurity and digital forensics field.
projects.responsibility: Use Docker Compose to build container configurations to support the development environment and production environment of the project; Deploy the website and services into AWS EC2; Domain name binding and SSL certificate installation; Proposal a revised architectural design based on current best practices and industry trends; Add new features; Project bugs fixing and UI/UE optimization.

projects.title: Cyber Vertex News Portal
projects.description: The Cyber Vertex project integrates cybersecurity and digital forensics news data and learning resources. Provide a one-stop network security-related content provision platform. It also provides some social functions, to help learners to communicate and learn in a technical community. It may promote the development of cybersecurity and digital forensics field.
projects.responsibility: Use Docker Compose to build container configurations to support the development environment and production environment of the project; Deploy the website and services into AWS EC2; Domain name binding and SSL certificate installation; Proposal a revised architectural design based on current best practices and industry trends; Add new features; Project bugs fixing and UI/UE optimization.

projects.title: CCTV.com
projects.description: China Central Television is the predominant public television broadcaster in Mainland China. CCTV has a network of 50 channels broadcasting different programmes and is accessible to more than one billion viewers. The cctv.com is the portal of CCTV.
projects.responsibility: Responsible for the construction of UGC website, team management, development and maintenance of video player (Flash & HTML5) and multi-functional upload components.

projects.title: QDD
projects.description: Multi-player real-time online competitive games, users can layout football players and start a competition. You can exchange points by battles and get corresponding prizes.
projects.responsibility: Responsible for the idea, project development and maintenance.

projects.title: CBox
projects.description: CBox is the most authoritative video client to watch CCTV (China Central Television) and dozens of Chinese local TV programs on the Internet. It has more than 300 million users and it is still growing.
projects.responsibility: One of the project manager, responsible for product architecture, technical selection and development team management.

projects.title: Thousand Dogs
projects.description: A creative web application based on Wechat, users can create thousands of dogs through this SPA, then share their blessings to friends, and can have beauty contests with others. After the game went online, it was widely spread.
projects.responsibility: Responsible for the idea, project development and maintenance.

projects.title: Time Signet
projects.description: A Wechat app to add text to the photos to record the baby's age, days of acquaintance and times of going to the gym.
projects.responsibility: Ideas, prototyping, design, coding and implementation.

projects.title: Crunching
projects.description: A casual game which was designed and developed by myself and released it on the AppStore. The cumulative number of downloads has exceeded one million.
projects.responsibility: From creativity, prototyping to design, development and implementation, all are completed and maintained by myself.

projects.title: Endless Nails
projects.description: A leisure game which was designed and developed by myself and released it on the AppStore. The cumulative number of downloads has exceeded 36 thousand.
projects.responsibility: From creativity, prototype to art design and development, all are completed by myself.

projects.title: Charging Spacecraft
projects.description: A casual action game for charging spacecraft to navigate in the interstellar space.
projects.responsibility: From creativity, prototyping to design, development and implementation, all are completed by myself.

projects.title: Pew Pew Pew
projects.description: An indie game which illustrates a story of a web developer who dive in web world and save his inspiration.
projects.responsibility: From creativity, prototyping to design, development and implementation, all are completed by myself.

projects.title: Showstopper Basketball
projects.description: Flash 3D basketball game, in this game you can manage your team, upgrade your players, and dunk on your opponents all from Facebook.
projects.responsibility: Responsible for the development of core game logic and UI animation effects of the game.

projects.title: Pocket Gridiron
projects.description: In this game you can manage your team, upgrade your roster, and move the chains in a mobile football gaming experience on Android and iOS
projects.responsibility: Responsible for the development of core game logic and UI animation effects.

projects.title: eingzone.com
projects.description: Blog widget personalized music player website, users can DIY and share music player. User can choose hundreds of music player styles. The highest number of registered users reached 2000 per day, and the total number of registered users exceeded 1.5 million.
projects.responsibility: Ideas, prototyping, design, coding and implementation, it's all done and maintained by myself.

projects.title: Online Customer Service System
projects.description: This online customer service system includes live broadcast, online whiteboard and chatting features.
projects.responsibility: Participate in product design, mainly responsible for the development, implementation and maintenance of the project.
